description:
## Objective 
Modify / Redesign the "About Us" Activity .

## Steps
1. Install mifos-mobile-cn android app in your phone .
2. On selecting Navigation Drawer , you will find a field "About Us" . Clicking on it will open up new Screen . This is "About Us" Screen . **You have to modify or redesign it to make it more User Friendly** .

## References
On Google type "about us page design in android studio"

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN app: Modify/Redesign the "About Us" Activity .
